posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Elkins
Hate to list this one.  This is a nice 1863 Civil War CDV of Abner Doubleday when he was a Brig. General (or One Star General for all you civilians [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]).  However, if you want it, you can have it for $500 (inludes shipping with Delivery Confirmation).  This will be basically what I have in this card.  Only selling due to a recent large purchase.  Please e-mail me at joejackson1919@comcast.net if you want the card.  Thanks for looking!
